{{also|cafe|CAFE|café|cafè}} ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|de|fr|café}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/kaˈfeː/}} * {{audio|de|De-Café.ogg|Audio}} * {{rhymes|de|eː}} * {{homophones|de|Kaffee}} {{qualifier|only according to one pronunciation variant of that word}} * {{hyphenation|de|Ca|fé}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n|Cafés|Cafés}} # a [[café]], a [[coffee shop]] #: {{syn|de|Kaffeehaus}} # [[coffee]] #: {{syn|de|Kaffee}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|s|s}} ====Hypernyms==== * {{l|de|Gaststätte}} ====Hyponyms==== {{col4|de|title=Hyponyms of Café (sense cafe)|Internet-Café|Lesecafé|Nachtcafé|Schachcafé|Sportcafé|Stammcafé|Stehcafé|Straßencafé}} {{col4|de|title=Hyponyms of Café (sense coffee)|Almcafé|Blümchencafé|Bohnencafé|Eiscafé|Gebirgscafé|[[Häferlcafé]] (Austria)|Katercafé|Kosakencafé|Milchcafé|Zarencafé}} [[Category:German terms spelled with É]] [[Category:de:Coffee]] ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Noun=== {{lb-noun|m}} # a [[café]]
